title: LAKEVIEW:  2 BED 2 BATH HW DW DINING ROOM LAUNDRY IN UNIT PORCH

Excellent location near Southport Corridor, steps to shopping and dining, Brown Line at Southport or Paulina, XSport, Whole Foods, and more!
